languages.text: {n}Абеляр тревожно осматривает вас и вздыхает с ворчливым облегчением:{/n} "Обошлось! Во имя пресветлой Терры, если б я потерял второго Вольного Торговца за такой пустяковый промежуток времени — мне осталось бы только застрелиться самому от вечного позора..."

{n}Abelard looks you over worriedly, then sighs in cantankerous relief.{/n} "That was a close call! For the sake of Holy Terra, if I had lost a second Rogue Trader in such a paltry span of time — my only option would have been to shoot myself out of unending shame..."
languages.original_text: {n}Абеляр тревожно осматривает вас и вздыхает с ворчливым облегчением:{/n} "Обошлось! Во имя пресветлой Терры, если б я потерял второго Вольного Торговца за такой пустяковый промежуток времени — мне осталось бы только застрелиться самому от вечного позора..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard looks you over worriedly, then sighs with grouchy relief.{/n} "That was a close call! By the holiest Terra, if I had lost a second Rogue Trader in such a paltry span of time — my only option would have been to shoot myself too, out of perpetual shame..."

{n}Abelard looks you over worriedly, then sighs with grouchy relief.{/n} "That was a close call! By the holiest Terra, if I had lost a second Rogue Trader in such a paltry span of time — my only option would have been to shoot myself too, out of perpetual shame..."

{n}Abelard looks you over worriedly, then sighs with grouchy relief.{/n} "That was a close call! For the sake of Holy Terra, if I had lost a second Rogue Trader in such a paltry span of time — my only option would have been to shoot myself out of unending shame..."

{n}Abelard looks you over worriedly, then sighs with grouchy relief.{/n} "That was a close call! For the sake of Holy Terra, if I had lost a second Rogue Trader in such a paltry span of time — my only option would have been to shoot myself out of unending shame..."

{n}Abelard looks you over worriedly, then sighs in cantankerous relief.{/n} "That was a close call! For the sake of Holy Terra, if I had lost a second Rogue Trader in such a paltry span of time — my only option would have been to shoot myself out of unending shame..."

{n}Abelard looks you over worriedly, then sighs in cantankerous relief.{/n} "That was a close call! For the sake of Holy Terra, if I had lost a second Rogue Trader in such a paltry span of time — my only option would have been to shoot myself out of unending shame..."

languages.text: {n}Abelard te mira, preocupado, y suspira con un refunfuño aliviado.{/n} «¡Ha estado muy cerca! Por la Sagrada Terra, si hubiera perdido a otr{mf|o|a} Comerciante Independiente en tan poco tiempo, me habría tenido que pegar un tiro para poner fin a mi vergüenza...».
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard looks you over worriedly, then sighs in cantankerous relief.{/n} "That was a close call! For the sake of Holy Terra, if I had lost a second Rogue Trader in such a paltry span of time — my only option would have been to shoot myself out of unending shame..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard te mira, preocupado, y suspira con un alivio gruñón.{/n} «¡Ha estado muy cerca! Por la Sagrada Terra, si hubiera perdido a otr{mf|o|a} Comerciante Independiente en tan poco tiempo, me habría tenido que pegar un tiro para poner fin a mi vergüenza...».

languages.text: {n}アベラルドは心配そうにこちらを見ていたが、安堵のため息をつく。{/n}「危ないところでした！聖なる地球の名にかけて、これほど短い期間でふたり目の自由開拓者を失っていたら、耐えきれぬ恥で自らを撃ち殺していたでしょう…」
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard looks you over worriedly, then sighs in cantankerous relief.{/n} "That was a close call! For the sake of Holy Terra, if I had lost a second Rogue Trader in such a paltry span of time — my only option would have been to shoot myself out of unending shame..."

traits.locale_text: {n}アベラルドは心配そうにこちらを見ていたが、安堵のため息をつく。{/n}「危ないところでした！聖なる地球の名にかけて、これほど短い期間でふたり目の自由開拓者を失っていたら、耐えきれぬ恥で自らを撃ち殺していたでしょう…」

languages.text: {n}阿贝拉德忧心忡忡地打量了你半晌，然后才不满地松了口气。{/n}“刚刚真是太危险了！看在神圣泰拉的份上，如果我在这么短的时间内就再次失去另一位行商浪人，那恐怕我只能举枪自尽，才能摆脱这刻骨铭心的耻辱……”
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard looks you over worriedly, then sighs in cantankerous relief.{/n} "That was a close call! For the sake of Holy Terra, if I had lost a second Rogue Trader in such a paltry span of time — my only option would have been to shoot myself out of unending shame..."

traits.locale_text: {n}阿贝拉德忧心忡忡地打量了你半晌，然后才恹恹地松了口气。{/n}“刚刚真是太危险了！看在神圣泰拉的份上，如果我在这么短的时间内就再次失去另一位行商浪人，那恐怕我只能举枪自尽，才能摆脱这刻骨铭心的耻辱……”

languages.text: {n}Abélard vous toise d'un air inquiet, puis pousse un soupir acariâtre.{/n} « Eh bien, c'était moins une ! Par la Sainte Terra, si j'avais perdu {mf|un autre libre-marchand|une autre libre-marchande} dans un laps de temps aussi court, je n'aurais eu d'autre choix que de me faire sauter la cervelle pour éviter de vivre éternellement dans la honte... »
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard looks you over worriedly, then sighs in cantankerous relief.{/n} "That was a close call! For the sake of Holy Terra, if I had lost a second Rogue Trader in such a paltry span of time — my only option would have been to shoot myself out of unending shame..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abélard vous toise d'un air inquiet, puis pousse un soupir de soulagement.{/n} « Eh bien, c'était moins une ! Par la Sainte Terra, si j'avais perdu {mf|un autre libre-marchand|une autre libre-marchande} dans un laps de temps aussi court, je n'aurais eu d'autre choix que de me faire sauter la cervelle pour éviter de vivre éternellement dans la honte... »

languages.text: {n}Abelard mustert dich besorgt und seufzt dann mit grummeliger Erleichterung.{/n} "Das war knapp! Beim Heiligen Terra, wenn ich in so kurzer Zeit einen zweiten Freihändler verloren hätte ... hätte ich mich vor endloser Scham nur noch selbst erschießen können ..."
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard looks you over worriedly, then sighs in cantankerous relief.{/n} "That was a close call! For the sake of Holy Terra, if I had lost a second Rogue Trader in such a paltry span of time — my only option would have been to shoot myself out of unending shame..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard mustert dich besorgt und seufzt dann mit grummeliger Erleichterung.{/n} "Das war knapp! Beim Heiligen Terra, wenn ich in so kurzer Zeit einen zweiten Freihändler verloren hätte ... hätte ich mich vor endloser Scham nur noch selbst erschießen können ..."

languages.text: {n}Abelard, endişe içinde seni yoklayıp huysuzca iç çekiyor.{/n} "Ucuz atlattık! Kutsal Terra aşkına, böylesine kısa bir sürede iki Hür Tacir birden kaybetmiş olsaydım ebedî utancımdan intihar ederdim..."
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard looks you over worriedly, then sighs in cantankerous relief.{/n} "That was a close call! For the sake of Holy Terra, if I had lost a second Rogue Trader in such a paltry span of time — my only option would have been to shoot myself out of unending shame..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard, endişe içinde seni yokluyor ve huysuzca iç çekiyor.{/n} “Ucuz atlattık! Kutsal Terra aşkına, böylesine kısa bir sürede iki Hür Tacir birden kaybetmiş olsaydım ebedî utancımdan intihar ederdim...”
